items.content_html: Pocketframe is a lightweight yet powerful PHP framework designed to simplify modern web application development. It provides an intuitive structure, elegant syntax, and a modular approach, enabling developers to build scalable, high-performance applications effortlessly.

It provides an intuitive structure, elegant syntax, and a modular approach, enabling developers to build scalable, high-performance applications effortlessly.

items.content_html: A simple password manager web application built with Preact for practicing component-based development. It allows users to add, edit, and delete stored passwords. This project demonstrates CRUD operations, state management, and lightweight UI design using Preact.
items.title: rax-2/PassManager_preact: A simple password manager web application built with Preact for practicing component-based development. It allows users to add, edit, and delete stored passwords. This project demonstrates CRUD operations, state management, and lightweight UI design using Preact.

items.content_html: Makzontexteditor is a modern, customizable, and lightweight rich text editor built with **React**, **TypeScript**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **Vite**. It offers intuitive formatting options, media embedding, and full control over your content creation workflow — perfect for blogs, CMS, note apps, and publishing platforms.

It offers intuitive formatting options, media embedding, and full control over your content creation workflow — perfect for blogs, CMS, note apps, and publishing platforms.
